spawn_settings.name: Spawn Settings
spawn_settings.description: General settings for monster, item, and NPC spawning.

ITEM_SPAWNRATE.name: Item Spawn Rate
ITEM_SPAWNRATE.description: A scaling factor that determines density of item spawns. A higher number means more items.

SPAWN_DENSITY.name: Monster Spawn Density
SPAWN_DENSITY.description: A scaling factor that determines density of monster spawns.

SPAWN_ANIMAL_DENSITY.name: Spawn Animal Density
SPAWN_ANIMAL_DENSITY.description: A scaling factor that determines density of animal spawns.

CARRION_SPAWNRATE.name: Carrion Spawnrate
CARRION_SPAWNRATE.description: A scaling factor that determines how often creatures spawn from rotting material.

NPC_DENSITY.name: Npc Density
NPC_DENSITY.description: A scaling factor that determines density of dynamic NPC spawns.

NPC_SPAWNTIME.name: NPC Spawn Rate
NPC_SPAWNTIME.description: Average days between random NPC spawns. Higher values mean fewer NPCs. 0 disables random NPCs.

SPAWN_DELAY.name: Spawn Delay
SPAWN_DELAY.description: How many days after the cataclysm the player spawns. Day 0 is the day of the cataclysm. Can be overridden by scenarios. Increasing this will cause food rot and monster evolution to advance.

MONSTER_UPGRADE_FACTOR.name: Monster Upgrade Factor
MONSTER_UPGRADE_FACTOR.description: A scaling factor that determines the time between monster upgrades. A higher number means slower evolution. Set to 0.00 to turn off monster upgrades.

STARTING_NPC.name: Starting Npc
STARTING_NPC.description: Determines whether starting NPCs should spawn, and if they do, how exactly.

RANDOM_NPC.name: Random Npc
RANDOM_NPC.description: If true, the game will randomly spawn NPCs during gameplay.

STATIC_NPC.name: Static Npc
STATIC_NPC.description: If true, static NPCs will spawn at pre-defined locations. Requires world reset.

BLACK_ROAD.name: Black Road
BLACK_ROAD.description: If enabled, zombies spawn at shelters, making the start harder.

VEHICLE_SPAWNRATE.name: Vehicle Spawnrate
VEHICLE_SPAWNRATE.description: A scaling factor that determines density of vehicle spawns.

WANDER_SPAWNS.name: Wandering Hordes
WANDER_SPAWNS.description: If enabled, zombies group into hordes that wander and move towards noise.

EVOLUTION_INVERSE_MULTIPLIER.name: Monster Evolution Scaling
EVOLUTION_INVERSE_MULTIPLIER.description: Multiplier for the time between monster upgrades. Higher values mean slower evolution. 0.00 disables upgrades.

ETERNAL_TIME_OF_DAY.name: Eternal Time of Day
ETERNAL_TIME_OF_DAY.description: Determines if the game world has a normal day/night cycle or is stuck in one state.

WORLD_END.name: World End Behavior
WORLD_END.description: What happens to the world when the last character dies.

CITY_SIZE.name: City Size
CITY_SIZE.description: Determines how large cities are. 0 disables cities.

ETERNAL_SEASON.name: Eternal Season
ETERNAL_SEASON.description: If enabled, the initial season lasts forever.

DEFAULT_REGION.name: Default Region
DEFAULT_REGION.description: Determines terrain, shops, plants, and more.

CITY_SPACING.name: City Spacing
CITY_SPACING.description: Determines how far apart cities are.

INITIAL_DAY.name: Initial Day
INITIAL_DAY.description: How many days into the year the cataclysm occurred. Day 0 is Spring 1. Day -1 randomizes the start date. Can be overridden by scenarios. This does not advance food rot or monster evolution.

cooking_kcal_buff.name: Cooking Kcal Buff
cooking_kcal_buff.description: Include the scaling calories from cooking buff?

MONSTER_RESILIENCE.name: Monster Resilience
MONSTER_RESILIENCE.description: Determines how much damage monsters can take. A higher value makes monsters more resilient and a lower makes them more flimsy. Requires world reset.

SPECIALS_DENSITY.name: Specials Density
SPECIALS_DENSITY.description: A scaling factor that determines density of overmap specials.

SPECIALS_SPACING.name: Specials Spacing
SPECIALS_SPACING.description: A number determing minimum distance between overmap specials. -1 allows intersections of specials.

CONSTRUCTION_SCALING.name: Construction Scaling
CONSTRUCTION_SCALING.description: Sets the time of construction in percents. '50' is two times faster than default, '200' is two times longer. '0' makes construction instant.

canmutprofmut.name: Canmutprofmut
canmutprofmut.description: Allow starting traits to be cancelled and effected by purifiers?

VEHICLE_DAMAGE.name: Vehicle Damage
VEHICLE_DAMAGE.description: A scaling factor that determines how damaged vehicles are.

CRAFTING_SPEED_MULT.name: Crafting Speed Mult
CRAFTING_SPEED_MULT.description: Sets default crafting speed in percents. '50' is two times faster than default, '200' is two times longer. '0' makes crafting instant.

GROWTH_SCALING.name: Growth Scaling
GROWTH_SCALING.description: Sets the time of crop growth in percents. '50' is two times faster than default, '200' is two times longer. '0' automatically scales growth time to match the world's season length.

althletics_encumbrance_buff.name: Althletics Encumbrance Buff
althletics_encumbrance_buff.description: Include the reduce all encumbrance per level of althletics buff?

MONSTER_SPEED.name: Monster Speed
MONSTER_SPEED.description: Determines the movement rate of monsters. A higher value increases monster speed and a lower reduces it. Requires world reset.

DISABLE_LIFTING.name: Disable Lifting
DISABLE_LIFTING.description: If true, strength checks and/or lifting qualities no longer need to be met in order to change parts.

INITIAL_TIME.name: Initial Time
INITIAL_TIME.description: Initial starting time of day on character generation.

VEHICLE_LOCKS.name: Vehicle Locks
VEHICLE_LOCKS.description: Determines if new vehicles can spawn with locked doors.

RAD_MUTATION.name: Rad Mutation
RAD_MUTATION.description: If true, radiation causes the player to mutate.

CHARACTER_POINT_POOLS.name: Character Point Pools
CHARACTER_POINT_POOLS.description: Allowed point pools for character generation.

RESTOCK_DELAY_MULT.name: Restock Delay Mult
RESTOCK_DELAY_MULT.description: A scaling factor that determines restock rate of merchants.
